<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Element Config (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v2.0/api/tenants/{tenant_id}/sites/{site_id}/elements/{element_id}/deviceidconfigs/{config_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get element level configs.
